concept.title: Artificial Intelligence
concept.shortdesc: Oxygen AI Positron is an advanced AI-powered solution designed to assist content creators, technical writers, and developers throughout every stage of the writing process. By leveraging the capabilities of AI platforms, Positron streamlines content creation and enhances productivity, thus empowering users to craft high-quality documentation and content with greater speed and confidence.

conbody.p: The Oxygen AI Positron add-ons integrate seamlessly with Oxygenâ€™s suite of desktop tools, web-based applications, and Eclipse distributions.

dd.p: Oxygen AI Positron for Desktop is an add-on which can be used with any of the following products: Oxygen XML Editor, Oxygen XML Author, Oxygen XML Developer, or Oxygen JSON Editor.
Oxygen AI Positron for Eclipse is a plugin which can be used with the Eclipse distributions of: Oxygen XML Editor, Oxygen XML Author, Oxygen XML Developer, or Oxygen JSON Editor.

dt.xref: Oxygen AI Positron for Web Author

dd.p: Oxygen AI Positron for Web Author brings AI support for Oxygen XML Web Author users.

dt.xref: Oxygen AI Positron for Content Fusion

dd.p: Oxygen AI Positron for Content Fusion brings AI support to the Content Fusion platform.
